metadata.name: NTLM Brute Force
metadata.comment: Detects common NTLM brute force device names

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 8004 AND (lower(LOWER(dst_endpoint.hostname)) in ('rdesktop', 'remmina', 'freerdp', 'windows7', 'windows8', 'windows2012', 'windows2016', 'windows2019')))

output.summary: Detects common NTLM brute force device names

metadata.objective: False positive: Systems with names equal to the spoofed ones used by the brute force tools Reference: https://www.varonis.com/blog/investigate-ntlm-brute-force
